revised_title: Optimizing Lighthouse Illumination: The Role of Reflectors and Lenses
scientific_discipline: Engineering and Technology > Optics and Illumination
tldr: The author explores the use of reflectors and lenses to increase the illuminating power of lighthouses. They found that the illuminating power is proportional to the number of mirrors or the surface of those mirrors. The author also explains how to calculate the increase of illuminating power due to a parabolic reflector or lens, and provides examples of their application in lighthouses.
